text: UAll√¢h! Akukho thixo (wumbi) ngaphandle kwaKhe, Uphila ngonaphakade, UnguMondli noMlondolozi wako konke okukhoyo. Akukho kozela nakulala kuMfumanayo Yena. Konke okusemazulwini nasemhlabeni kokwaKhe. Ngubani na onokuMcenga kungengamvume yaKhe? Uyakwazi okuqhubekayo phambi [kwezidalwa zaKhe (kweli hlabathi)] nokuza kuqhubeka emva kwazo (kuBomi Obuzayo). Akukho nto abanokuyiqulatha elulwazi lwaKhe ngaphandle koko Athande (ukuba bakwazi). IsiHlalo78 SaKhe songamele amazulu nomhlaba, kwaye Akava kudinwa ekuwagcineni (amazulu nomhlaba) nasekuwalondolozeni, Yaye Uphakamile Yena, Mkhulu
